Summary I am a Ph.D. student in Financial Econometrics at UNC Chapel Hill. My general area of research interest is asset pricing, and I am currently undertaking a project on conditional skewness and quantile estimations of equity returns. I find mathematical finance quite exciting and appealing, as it bears a great relevance to my research. I am seeking a 2015 summer internship in quantitative finance/consulting at the moment, and will be on the job market for full-time positions in 2016.
